Package com.jme.scene.plugins.blender.landscape

Class LandscapeHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jme.scene.plugins.blender.AbstractBlenderHelper
      • com.jme.scene.plugins.blender.landscape.LandscapeHelper
  • public class LandscapeHelper
extends AbstractBlenderHelper
    The class that allows to load the following:
  • the ambient light of the scene
  • the sky of the scene (with or without texture)
Author:
Marcin Roguski (Kaelthas)

    • Method Detail

      • toAmbientLight

        public com.jme.light.Light toAmbientLight​(Structure worldStructure)
        Loads scene ambient light.
        Parameters:
        worldStructure - the world's blender structure
        Returns:
        the scene's ambient light

      • toFog

        public com.jme.post.filters.FogFilter toFog​(Structure worldStructure)
        The method loads fog for the scene. NOTICE! Remember to manually set the distance and density of the fog. Unfortunately blender's fog parameters in no way fit to the JME.
        Parameters:
        worldStructure - the world's structure
        Returns:
        fog filter or null if scene does not define it

      • toBackgroundColor

        public com.jme.math.ColorRGBA toBackgroundColor​(Structure worldStructure)
        Loads the background color.
        Parameters:
        worldStructure - the world's structure
        Returns:
        the horizon color of the world which is used as a background color.

      • toSky

        public com.jme.scene.Spatial toSky​(Structure worldStructure)
                            throws BlenderFileException
        Loads scene's sky. Sky can be plain or textured. If no sky type is selected in blender then no sky is loaded.
        Parameters:
        worldStructure - the world's structure
        Returns:
        the scene's sky
        Throws:
        BlenderFileException - blender exception is thrown when problems with blender file occur
